channel.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker Series
channel.description:
[size=20pt][RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker Series Summary[/size] <----Instructions----> 1. Ok First As You See There Are Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, TalkAgain. First Fill In What You Want It To Say In The (' ') Marks. If You Want To Only Have Say, Two Of The Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, TalkAgain Just Leave The Fields Empty.
2. After Done With That Start Up Runescape (Better If Game Client) Go To Login Screen, Dont Log In! Specifie The RS Window By Clicking The Specifie Mark Thingy.
3. Then Log In Normaly Once Logged In Press SCAR And Run The Script. Right After You Run The Script Click On Runescape Again And Begin Playing Normally.
4. Just Walk Around And Watch SCAR Do All The Hard Typing For You. Enjoy =)
<----Summary----> Of all the versions made you can see what happened to them and witch is the newest versions that you can get.
V.1: This was a very basic AutoTalker it was my first script. I wouldn't go expecting much becuase it was pretty basic with not any "cool" features.
V.2: This was another version of the series that was pretty much more like an update. This was my second script. I said to myself that the first one was to boring with just one sentence over and over, so I made this one. V.2 allows multiple words to be typed and used. This was named Multi Word
V.3: This AutoTalker has a very strange history. When I released V.2 I thought that it was a big deal but then people including me had doubts on its usefullness. It basically went through each letter you typed and would go in order over and over. This was a slight different than V.1 but it still didnt offer much protection. Thats were V.3 comes in. V.3 was a third script of mine that I had added random typing. SCAR would automatically choose between all of your sentences. This was named B.P for Better Protection.
V.3.2: This script was not much of a new version but more of an update of V.3. Because of this it was named to V.3.2 (There is no V.3.1 because the original is the 1) since it was an update. It just gave a countdown procedure. This remand the same as V.3 B.P.
V.4: V.4 was taken and rewriten to have added Anit-Randoms! Now you can be at a famous selling spot and just have SCAR declaring your text and just incase some random person would come to you and speak V.4 will deal with them and keep on going. V.4 has also been added with a feature that stops the procedure if your not logged into Runescape. Think about it this way if your not logged in it wont go typing all your edited text in things like Browsers that your in or even SCAR if your still on that. V.4 has been named New G.G for New Game Generation.
V.5: New!: V.5 has been added with new features! V.5 Includes Anti-Ban, a new step up for the LevExidus series. It now has the control to AutoLogin your player if not already logged in. It has now been added with new and improved Anti-Randoms! It now has FindFastRandoms and some other randoms that would keep you in a tough situation. It has randoms including FindMime and more! V.5 was anme F.I.V.E for Formatted Inbetween Venom Entity! Just a long word saying that it was made with a lot of things going on around it, but still being made.(Think about being bitten by a snake and having to keep walking through the moantains with its venom inside you)
Look Below And See The Download Sizes To Visualize The Changes
<----Sneak Peek---->
[code] { LevExidus AutoTalker V.3.2 B.P ] [ By Jvwarrior ] [_________________________________________] [ Credits: ] [ Makers Of SCAR ] [ hey321 for editing ] [_________________________________________] [ Fix's ] [ V.1: Basic one word AutoTalker. ] [ V.2: Allowed mulitple words. ] [ V.3: Randomized sentences. ] [ V.3.2: CountDown Added. ] [_________________________________________] [ Instructions: ] [1. Ok First As You See ] [ There Are Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, ] [ TalkAgain. ] [ First Fill In What You Want It ] [ To Say In The (' ') Marks. ] [ If You Want To Only Have Say, ] [ Two Of The Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, ] [ TalkAgain Just Leave The ] [ FieldsEmpty. ] [ ] [2. After Done With That Start Up ] [ Runescape (Better If Game Client), ] [ Go To Login Screen, Dont Log In! ] [ Specifie The RS Window By ] [ ClickingThe Specifie Mark Thingy. ] [ ] [3. Then Log In Normaly Once Logged ] [ In Press SCAR And Run The Script. ] [ Right After You Run The Script ] [ Click On Runescape Again ] [ And Begin Playing Normally. ] [ ] [4. Just Walk Around And Watch SCAR ] [ Do All The Hard Typing For You. Enjoy =)] [_________________________________________}[/code]
[size=20pt]By Jvwarrior[/size]
I am now studying forms. Look forward to seeing them in later scripts.
As I continue to become better and better I hope all of my scripts will benifit you in any way. Please comment
UPDATE: V.1 removed. All Scripts Are Available Below!:

item.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker Series
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

It’s stupid to make the person say that the person has to say three things if they only want to say one or two.

Make case start at 0 and use a variable for it.

Make progress report.

You can make it like this:

{     LevExidus AutoTalker V.5 F.I.V.E     ]
[             By Jvwarrior                 ]
[__________________________________________]
[               Credits:                   ]
[            Makers Of SCAR                ]
[__________________________________________]
[                Fix's                     ]
[ V.1: Basic one word AutoTalker.          ]
[ V.2: Allowed mulitple words.             ]
[ V.3: Randomized sentences.               ]
[ V.3.2: CountDown Added.                  ]
[ V.4: Anti-Randoms + Log In Failure       ]
[ V.5: Improved Anti-Randoms + Anti-Ban    ]
[__________________________________________]
[           Instructions:                  ]
[1. Ok First As You See                    ]
[ There Are Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2,        ]
[ TalkAgain.                               ]
[ First Fill In What You Want It           ]
[ To Say In The (' ') Marks.               ]
[ If You Want To Only Have Say,            ]
[ Two Of The Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2,       ]
[ TalkAgain Just Leave The                 ]
[ FieldsEmpty.                             ]
[                                          ]
[2. After Done With That Start Up          ]
[ Runescape (Better If Game Client),       ]
[ Go To Login Screen, Dont Log In!         ]
[ Specifie The RS Window By                ]
[ ClickingThe Specifie Mark Thingy.        ]
[                                          ]
[3. Then Log In Normaly Once Logged        ]
[ In Press SCAR And Run The Script.        ]
[ Right After You Run The Script           ]
[ Click On Runescape Again                 ]
[ And Begin Playing Normally.              ]
[                                          ]
[4. Just Walk Around And Watch SCAR        ]
[ Do All The Hard Typing For You. Enjoy =) ]
[__________________________________________]
[                   Also:                  ]
[   Wenever you want to stop the           ]
[    script press F5.(eg. See's trade)     ]
[__________________________________________]
[                Chat Effects              ]
[                                          ]
[              *Color Effects*             ]
[                   glow1                  ]
[                   glow2                  ]
[                   flash1                 ]
[                   flash2                 ]
[                   flash3                 ]
[                   red                    ]
[                   green                  ]
[                   cyan                   ]
[                   white                  ]
[                                          ]
[              *Special Effect*            ]                      ]
[                    shake:                ]
[                    scroll:               ]
[                    wave:                 ]
[                    slide:                ]
[__________________________________________}
// I have made it Noob friendly for people who want to know whats going on. Feel free to use this in future scripts of yours.
// if you want to only have a certain
//amount of text just keep them blank.
//to prevent you from being detected i suggest
//you dont change the TWait. For better
//protection make it higher.
program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}

var
ModBMP,x,y:integer;

{================= EDIT YOUR TEXT IN HERE ======================}
const
  HowManyTimesToTalkAndSay = '5';//how many times to talk and say leave blank the ones you dont want to say.
  //5 is default.
  Talk = 'Input All Text Between ('') Those Marks!'; //what to say
  TWait = 500; //time to wait after typing
  Say = 'If You Want One Not To Be Used Just Keep Them Empty'; // Second Text
  Talk2 = 'Be Sure To Insert Things Between The ('') Marks'; //Third text
  Say2 = 'Insert Your Other Sentences Here'; // Fourth Text
  TalkAgain = 'More Text To Be Insterted Here'; // Last Text (Fifth)
  Effect = 'Type what effect you would like(effects listed above)'; //Effects

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
  HowManyPlayers := 1;
  NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
  CurrentPlayer := 0;

  Players[0].Name := 'Usernamehere'; //place your username here
  Players[0].Pass := 'Passwordhere'; //place your password here
  Players[0].Nick := 'Nicknamehere'; //3 - 4 letters of YOUR username, example: sern
  Players[0].Active := True;
end;

{===================== NO MORE TOUCHING! =================================}
procedure LoadBMP;
begin
ModBMP := BitmapFromString(13, 11, 'z78DA3330A037707274723' +
       '430307732774215C71481005743574354BDB84C43560911C1540F' +
       '51838B84A8C71427CF345C24754D839833924D23CF4C5CE6500B0' +
       '000AB69B141');
       end;

procedure Credits;
begin
  Writeln(' Welcome To LevExidus AutoTalker V.5!');
  Wait(500);
  Writeln(' *============ LevExidus AutoTalker V.5 ============*')
    Writeln(' *===========       By Jvwarrior         ===========*')
end;

procedure Startup;
begin
  Writeln('Initializing');
  Wait(2000);
  Writeln('3');
  Wait(1000);
  Writeln('2');
  Wait(1000);
  Writeln('1');
  Wait(1500);
  Writeln('You May Now Click On Your Runescape Windows');
  Wait(1500);
end;

procedure AndoTalkin;
begin
  Wait(TWait + random(700));
  if (not(LoggedIn)) then Exit;
  if(HowManyTimesToTalkAndSay = '5')then
  begin
  case Random(5) of
    1: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk);

    2: typesend(Effect+':'+Say);

    3: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk2);

    4: typesend(Effect+':'+Say2);

    5: typesend(Effect+':'+TalkAgain);
  end;
  if (not(LoggedIn)) then Exit;
  if(HowManyTimesToTalkAndSay = '4')then
 begin
  case Random(4) of
    1: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk);

    2: typesend(Effect+':'+Say);

    3: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk2);

    4: typesend(Effect+':'+Say2);
    
  end;
 begin
  if (not(LoggedIn)) then Exit;
  if(HowManyTimesToTalkAndSay = '3')then
 begin
  case Random(3) of
    1: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk);

    2: typesend(Effect+':'+Say);

    3: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk2);
    
  end;
 begin
  if (not(LoggedIn)) then Exit;
  if(HowManyTimesToTalkAndSay = '2')then
 begin
    case Random(2) of
    1: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk);

    2: typesend(Effect+':'+Say);

    end;
  begin
  if (not(LoggedIn)) then Exit;
  if(HowManyTimesToTalkAndSay = '1')then
 begin
  case Random(1) of
  1: typesend(Effect+':'+Talk);

                  end;
                end;
              end;
{LMFAO!}    end;
          end;
        end;
      end;
    end;
  end;
end;

procedure Login;
begin
if (not(LoggedIn)) then
LoginPlayer;
end;

procedure ScanForMod;
begin
if(findbitmap(ModBMP,x,y))then
begin
writeln('OMG Mod!');
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

function FindFastRandoms: Boolean;
var
  i: Integer;
begin
  for i:=1 to 10 do
  begin
    case I of
     1:  If FindDead then
           Result := True;
     2:  If FindMod then
           Result := True;
     3:  If FindMime then
           Result := True;
     4:  If FindMaze then
           Result := True;
     5:  If FindQuiz then
           Result := True;
     6:  If FindDemon then
           Result := True;
     7: begin
           if NoGameTab then
           begin
             Result := True;
             Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := 'No GameTab';
             Logout;
             Exit;
           end;
         end;
     8: begin
           if InBlack then
           begin
             Result := True;
             Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := 'InBlack';
             Logout;
             Exit;
           end;
         end;
       9: RC;
       10: Respond;
    end;
    wait(1);
  end;
end;
procedure FindTheRandoms;
begin
  FindTalk;
  FindFastRandoms;
  FindNormalRandoms;
  FindLamp('Woodcutting');
  SolvePinball;
  if (FindFight) then
  begin
    MakeCompass('N');
    RunTo('N', True);
    Wait(7000 +Random(3000));
    RunBack;
  end;
end;

procedure ABan;
begin
  if (not(LoggedIn)) then
  Exit;
  case Random(8) of
    0: RandomRClick;
    1: HoverSkill('Woodcutting', False);
    2: RandomMovement;
    3: BoredHuman;
    4: PickUpMouse;
    5: AlmostLogout;
    6: begin
         GameTab(1 +Random(12));
         wait(2000 +Random(1000));
         GameTab(4);
       end;
    end;
end;



begin // begins
  ClearDebug;
  Credits;
  Startup;
  DeclarePlayers;
  NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
  Login;
  repeat //Repeats The Following after this until the until():
    if (InChat('yo')) then typesend('whats up?');
    LoadBMP;
    FindFastRandoms;
    FindTheRandoms;
    ScanForMod;
    ABan;
    AndoTalkin; // Does everything in procedure TalkOn;
  until (isfkeydown(5)) // Keeps repeating Until you press the F5 key.
end. //End of entire Script

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker Series
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

[size=20pt][RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker Series Summary[/size]
<----Instructions---->

  1. Ok First As You See There Are Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, TalkAgain. First Fill In What You Want It To Say In The (’ ') Marks.
    If You Want To Only Have Say, Two Of The Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, TalkAgain Just Leave The Fields Empty.

  2. After Done With That Start Up Runescape (Better If Game Client) Go To Login Screen, Dont Log In! Specifie The RS Window By Clicking The Specifie Mark Thingy.

  3. Then Log In Normaly Once Logged In Press SCAR And Run The Script. Right After You Run The Script Click On Runescape Again
    And Begin Playing Normally.

  4. Just Walk Around And Watch SCAR Do All The Hard Typing For You. Enjoy =)

<----Summary---->
Of all the versions made you can see what happened to them and witch is the newest versions that you can get.

V.1: This was a very basic AutoTalker it was my first script. I wouldn’t go expecting much becuase it was pretty basic with not any “cool” features.

V.2: This was another version of the series that was pretty much more like an update. This was my second script. I said to myself that the first one was to boring with just one sentence over and over, so I made this one. V.2 allows multiple words to be typed and used. This was named Multi Word

V.3: This AutoTalker has a very strange history. When I released V.2 I thought that it was a big deal but then people including me had doubts on its usefullness. It basically went through each letter you typed and would go in order over and over. This was a slight different than V.1 but it still didnt offer much protection. Thats were V.3 comes in. V.3 was a third script of mine that I had added random typing. SCAR would automatically choose between all of your sentences. This was named B.P for Better Protection.

V.3.2: This script was not much of a new version but more of an update of V.3. Because of this it was named to V.3.2 (There is no V.3.1 because the original is the 1) since it was an update. It just gave a countdown procedure. This remand the same as V.3 B.P.

V.4: V.4 was taken and rewriten to have added Anit-Randoms! Now you can be at a famous selling spot and just have SCAR declaring your text and just incase some random person would come to you and speak V.4 will deal with them and keep on going. V.4 has also been added with a feature that stops the procedure if your not logged into Runescape. Think about it this way if your not logged in it wont go typing all your edited text in things like Browsers that your in or even SCAR if your still on that. V.4 has been named New G.G for New Game Generation.

V.5: New!: V.5 has been added with new features! V.5 Includes Anti-Ban, a new step up for the LevExidus series. It now has the control to AutoLogin your player if not already logged in. It has now been added with new and improved Anti-Randoms!
It now has FindFastRandoms and some other randoms that would keep you in a tough situation. It has randoms including FindMime and more! V.5 was anme F.I.V.E for Formatted Inbetween Venom Entity! Just a long word saying that it was made with a lot of things going on around it, but still being made.(Think about being bitten by a snake and having to keep walking through the moantains with its venom inside you)

Look Below And See The Download Sizes To Visualize The Changes

<----Sneak Peek---->

{ LevExidus AutoTalker V.3.2 B.P ] [ By Jvwarrior ] [_________________________________________] [ Credits: ] [ Makers Of SCAR ] [ hey321 for editing ] [_________________________________________] [ Fix's ] [ V.1: Basic one word AutoTalker. ] [ V.2: Allowed mulitple words. ] [ V.3: Randomized sentences. ] [ V.3.2: CountDown Added. ] [_________________________________________] [ Instructions: ] [1. Ok First As You See ] [ There Are Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, ] [ TalkAgain. ] [ First Fill In What You Want It ] [ To Say In The (' ') Marks. ] [ If You Want To Only Have Say, ] [ Two Of The Talk, Say, Talk2, Say2, ] [ TalkAgain Just Leave The ] [ FieldsEmpty. ] [ ] [2. After Done With That Start Up ] [ Runescape (Better If Game Client), ] [ Go To Login Screen, Dont Log In! ] [ Specifie The RS Window By ] [ ClickingThe Specifie Mark Thingy. ] [ ] [3. Then Log In Normaly Once Logged ] [ In Press SCAR And Run The Script. ] [ Right After You Run The Script ] [ Click On Runescape Again ] [ And Begin Playing Normally. ] [ ] [4. Just Walk Around And Watch SCAR ] [ Do All The Hard Typing For You. Enjoy =)] [_________________________________________}

[size=20pt]By Jvwarrior[/size]

I am now studying forms. Look forward to seeing them in later scripts.

As I continue to become better and better I hope all of my scripts will benifit you in any way. Please comment

UPDATE: V.1 removed.
All Scripts Are Available Below!:
